title: Gradient
description: Animated soft-light gradient with 3 drifting color stops

title: Stars
description: Starfield with rotating layers, customizable colors and speed

title: Geometric
description: Geometric planet with procedural surface patterns

title: Spherical Fibonacci
description: Animated spherical fibonacci dot pattern on a rotating sphere

title: Water
description: TDM Seascape — procedural ocean with volumetric waves

title: black hole sun
description: black hole sun

title: Moon Water
description: Moonlit ocean with a big bright moon, gentle waves, and shimmering reflections

title: Galaxy
description: Milky Way galaxy — dense particle starfield with nebula clouds and galactic core

title: Etherea
description: Cycling font styles per letter with 18 visual patterns

title: Wave
description: Sine displacement per letter with shadow

title: Cascade
description: Tiled rows with wave offsets and alternating colors

title: Digifade
description: Glitch dissolve with horizontal slice displacement

title: Coil
description: Text on spiral rings with 4 shape variants

title: Flag
description: Waving flag surface with 4 wave variants

title: Bricks
description: Grid with animated displacement and 3 pattern variants

title: Spacy
description: Perspective tunnel rows with 4 depth variants

title: 3D Type
description: Layered depth text with parallax perspective, hue gradients, and breathing animation

title: Star Constellation
description: Drifting star particles connected by thin lines, drawn to the mouse

title: Fluid Simulation
description: Navier-Stokes fluid simulation — vorticity confinement, pressure projection, mouse interaction. Port of Pavel Dobryakov's WebGL-Fluid-Simulation.

title: Spinning Shape
description: Rotating cube with adjustable speed, color, and size

title: Spinning Heads
description: 3D head gallery with 7 material presets — Standard, Wireframe, Flat, Chrome, Glass, X-Ray, Normal. Auto-loads LeePerrySmith bust or use your own model.

title: Birds
description: Flocking birds — procedural boid flocks with wing-flapping V-shaped silhouettes against an atmospheric sky

title: Cube in Water
description: Chrome cube bobbing on a raymarched ocean — procedural sky, wave reflections, underwater darkening

title: ASCII Matrix
description: Falling columns of ASCII characters — matrix rain with density-mapped glyphs

title: Typewriter
description: Typewriter — characters appear one by one with a blinking cursor

title: ASCII Rain
description: Falling columns of your custom message text — matrix rain using your words

title: Tesseract
description: 4D hypercube — 16 vertices and 32 edges rotating through four-dimensional space, projected to 3D

title: Wind
description: Minimal gradient movements — soft drifting color fields like a gentle breeze

title: Dancing Cube
description: SDF raymarched box/octahedron blend — driven by body tracking parameters (rotation, scale, glow, morph, alive)
